text: Yep, also true! VegaLite is a grammar of graphics type thing, so you need to buy into that approach, and that is just a very distinct philosophy for plotting than say the recipe philosophy of Plots. But if you DO want the GoG thing, it works pretty well. Plus it has a large dev team behind it that is constantly working on it, so it is gaining new stuff all the time.
